sentences.english: The road winds through the forest.
The mountain ridges in this area twist and twine, stretching endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 这个山区的山脉蜿蜒曲折，连绵不绝。

sentences.english: Staring through the window, I saw the snake like lighting crawling on the gray and heavy sky.
sentences.chinese: 透过窗，只见那电蛇在黑沉沉的天空蜿蜒。

sentences.english: The man-made water system wanders 7 kilometers long, reaching every corner of the scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒七公里长的人工水系四通八达环绕着整个景区。

sentences.english: The stone stairs stretches to the entrance of Liang Garden.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒曲折的石梯一直延伸至良庄入口处。

sentences.english: Love rivers have wound the life, only then sees sweetheart's fisherman wharf.
sentences.chinese: 爱情河流过蜿蜒了生活，才看见情人的渔人码头。

sentences.english: As it approaches the sea, the river meanders over the coastal plain.
sentences.chinese: 快要入海时，印度河在沿海平原里蜿蜒流淌。

sentences.english: One part of the Serpentine is kept for swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒河的一段划为游泳区。

sentences.english: The comb-shape road The zigzag road looks like a comb from afar.
sentences.chinese: 《木梳路段》蜿蜒曲折的山路形状像梳子一样。

sentences.english: The river debouches into the sea at…
Traceable among the rough marks of hatchet and chisel were delicate lines zigzagging .
sentences.chinese: 近看，耐人寻味，在粗犷的斧凿中行走着蜿蜒的线。

sentences.english: This river meanders all the way across China.
Hour-long queues at the tills that snaked around the store were putting many shoppers off.
sentences.chinese: 商店里蜿蜒曲折，近一小时的长队让很多购物者却步。

sentences.english: The road zigzagged into the distance, wiping the tears, you continued your journey.
sentences.chinese: 道路蜿蜒通向远方，擦干泪水，你继续你的旅程。

sentences.english: A stream meandered towards the sea.
sentences.chinese: 一条小溪蜿蜒流向大海。

sentences.english: A snake wriggled across the road.

definition: continuous (esp. of mountain ranges)/to stretch long and unbroken/a continuous link/sostenuto (sustained, in music)
to stretch in an unbroken chain (esp. of mountains)
